Run Cron: Send email notification on a task failure
Executar Cron: Enviar notificação por e-mail em caso de falha de tarefa

Run Cron: Please input any new email address on a new line
Executar Cron: Insira qualquer novo endereço de e-mail em uma nova linha

Run Cron:
You can use any of these variables to configure an email subject:
- {{job_code}}: code of the schedule job
- {{executed_at}}: execution datetime
- {{message}}: error message

You can use any of these variables to configure an email content:
- {{job_code}}: code of the schedule job
- {{executed_at}}: execution datetime
- {{message}}: error message

Run Cron: Please enter the value in minutes. Enter 0 to receive notifications without filtering
Executar Cron: Please enter the value in minutes. Enter 0 to receive notifications without filtering

Run Cron:
The setting is used to avoid 'spamming' from a frequently executed jobs. If there is a multifunctional job that runs every 5 minutes, then it would disturb you with emails every 5 minutes as well. Using the field you can specify the time period when a single job will not disturb you with the same failure email after the first message was sent. It does not affect notifications from other jobs.
e.g. If the setting value is 60, then any multifunctional job will be able to send you notification not more than once per hour.
Executar Cron:
The setting is used to avoid 'spamming' from a frequently executed jobs. If there is a multifunctional job that runs every 5 minutes, then it would disturb you with emails every 5 minutes as well. Using the field you can specify the time period when a single job will not disturb you with the same failure email after the first message was sent. It does not affect notifications from other jobs.
e.g. If the setting value is 60, then any multifunctional job will be able to send you notification not more than once per hour.
